掍字的基本解释

掍
hùn
古同“混”，同；混合：“乘云阁而上下兮，纷蒙笼以掍成。”
缝纫东西滚边；缘边。

掍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hùn］
［《廣韻》胡本切，上混，匣。］
(1)同；混合。
(2)振起。

掍字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　掍； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页437第07
【唐韻】【集韻】?古本切，音袞。【說文】同也。　又【唐韻】胡本切【集韻】【韻會】戸袞切，?音混。義同。【揚子·方言】宋衞之閒曰綷，或曰掍。東齊曰醜。【班固·西都賦】掍建章而連外屬。【註】與混同。【王褒·洞簫賦】帶以象牙，掍其會合。【註】帶猶飾也，飾之象牙，同於會合之處。　又【揚雄·甘泉賦】薌呹肸以掍根。【註】振起眾根。　【集韻】或作?。

掍字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
掍字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Cut off
hùn
The ancients are "mixed" and same; mixed: "Crawling up and down in the cloud pavilion, making a lot of cages together."
To piping something to sew; a rim.
Cut off
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hùn］
["Guangyun" Hu Benqie, upmix, box. ]
(1) Same; mixed.
(2) Vibrate up.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　掍; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 437 No. 07
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ancient version cut, Yin Gun. [Said the text] Same thing.　[Tang Yun] Hu Benqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] Jian Gongqie,? Sound mixing. The same meaning. 【Yangtze Dialect】Song Weizhi said “Yi” or “Bai” in leisure. Dong Qi said ugly. 【Bangu·Xidu Fu】Building chapters and connecting foreign subordinates. [Note] Confusion with. [Wang Bao·Dong Xiao Fu] Bring ivory to help you meet. [Note] The ivory decorated with you is also at the meeting place.　[Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu] 芗 芗藸莸 to take root. [Note] Raise the roots.　【Jiyun】or make?.
